metadata.name: ATTENTION
metadata.description: Ever given your ATTENTION to a thing, a person, or place? This NFT COLLECTION is limited to 2222 copies. Each NFT upon minting, includes 1 song NFTs from Kellz new EP, Kaioken. In addition, holders of the NFT can expect to receive exclusive drops such as films, comics, images, and unique concert attendance opportunities. Song NFTs will also have earning potential on the open marketplace. Owners of all 8 songs will receive MASSIVE real-life and digital rewards, including an exclusive concert + pre-party with Kellz, limited edition Merch, and more!"
